snippet.title: Deadly Premonition 2: A Blessing in Disguise - Official Steam Release Trailer | Summer of Gaming
snippet.description:
Deadly Premonition 2 is available now on Steam. Check out the funny reveal trailer. 

Deadly Premonition 2: A Blessing in Disguise is both a sequel and a prequel to Deadly Premonition, following Agent Davis and Agent Jones as they begin a new investigation into the Le Carré serial murders.

#IGN #Gaming #SummerOfGaming
